warayata genwana kiripiti thongawalin labagath sampal hathak parikshawata lak kirimen anathuruwa di.si.di rasayanikaya adangu nowana bawata karmika thakshanika aayathanaya thahawuru karayi.ee anuwa ema kiripitiwala gataluwak nomathi athara eewa welenda pola wetha nikuth karannayi adala samagam wetha danum dimata aahara upadeshaka kamituwa thiranaya kara atha.di.si.di rasayanikaya adangu dayi pariksha karana lada kiripiti sampal wala warthawa saukhya amathyanshaya wetha eeye (19) baradun athara ee anuwa adala kiripiti sambandhayen gataluwak nomathi bawata saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral waidya palitha mahipala mahathage pradhanathwayen raswu aahara upadeshaka kamituwa thiranaya kalaha.aanayanika kiripiti sambandhayen mathuwa thibena thaththwaya salakillata gena eewaye di.si.di rasayanikaya adangudayi pariksha kirima sandaha saukhya amathyanshaya wisin ee ee kiripiti sampal karmika thakshanika aayathanaya wetha yomu karana athara eewa pariksha kirimen anathuruwa welenda polata nikuth karanawada, nadda yanna sambandhayen thiranayakata elambaeyi.parikshawata lak kirimen anathuruwa gataluwak nomathi bawata thahawuru karagath kiripiti welenda polata nikuth karannayi adala samagam wetha danum dimata saukhya amathyanshaya piyawara gena atha..
